scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:course" "npm run dev:test" "npm run dev:notification" "npm run dev:payment" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:scholarship" "npm run dev:content"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api-gateway && npm install && cd ../services/auth-service && npm install && cd ../course-service && npm install && cd ../test-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install && cd ../payment-service && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../scholarship-service && npm install && cd ../content-service && npm install
